dmca.title: C & D
dmca.body:
May 12, 2006

VIA CERTIFIED MAIL

Noble A. Craft

Nathanial A. Craft

722 W. Euless Blvd.

Euless, Texas 76040

Re: SoSoy Co., Inc.

Sue Ellen Davis

Dear Sirs:

Please be advised that I have been retained by Ms. Sue Ellen Davis to represent her in the ongoing disputes regarding the operation of SoSoy Co., Inc.

At this point, I do not think it would be productive to set forth an in-depth recitation of the facts in this matter. However, it is important to address a few critical issues at this point.

First, at this time, Ms. Davis is not able to access the SoSoy Co. offices or her personal items in the office. This is due to actions you have taken to exclude Ms. Davis from the SoSoy Co. premises. As you may know, over the past week, Ms. Davis has made several attempts to gain access to the building. Such attempts have been unsuccessful. There are several items Ms. Davis wishes to retrieve from the office. Specifically, items in the office belonging to Ms. Davis include: the Apple G4 computer; her portfolio, including personal artwork; and various childhood toys, including milk trucks and bottles. At this time, Ms. Davis hereby demands that all personal items, including but not limited to the above-listed items, be returned to her. Alternatively, please advise me of when we can arrange to have someone pick up Ms. Davis
dmca.principal_name: Sue Ellen Davis/ SoSoy Co. / SoSoy Co. Corporation (Inc.)
dmca.recipient_name: Noble A. Craft & Nathanial A. Craft (CORPORATE OFFICE)
